body:
the actual download is: `https://github.com/libgd/libgd/releases/download/gd-2.2.4/libgd-2.2.4.tar.gz` however
```
==> Fetching https://github.com/libgd/libgd/releases/download/2.2.4/lib2.2.4.tar.gz

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from https://github.com/libgd/libgd/releases/download/2.2.4/lib2.2.4.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for libgd-2.2.4-me7ixfjderv2zdr5r3nbfef47elpzi7l
```
title: libgd: url parser is broken for this package
